thread.title: Residents march through streets in anti-fracking demo
thread.title_full: Residents march through streets in anti-fracking demo | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Residents march through streets in anti-fracking demo
text:
Residents who fear fracking could blight a north Derbyshire village marched through nearby streets today.
Residents hold anti-fracking protest Credit: ITV Yorkshire They are worried that plans by the company Ineos to drill for shale gas will lead to environmental damage at Marsh Lane
They marched around four miles from Mosborough through Eckington and say they will continue to fight the proposals.
Ineos says it is determined to press ahead but will keep people in the community informed.
Play video Last updated Sat 25 Feb 2017 derbyshire
